instructions: On iPhone 6 or later, go to Settings > Battery. Tap Battery Health. iPhone displays information about your battery s capacity, peak performance, and whether your battery needs to be serviced.

Open the Android's settings on your device. Tap Display . Toggle the Dark Theme option On . Now, any app that supports the mode should automatically do so. If you decide to turn it off, you can follow the same instructions but toggle the Dark Theme option Off .
Open your Gmail app and tap the hamburger menu in the upper left of the screen. Tap Settings . Tap General settings . Tap Theme , then choose the Dark option.
